itemInfo.itemDesc: A ring decorated with a Resplendent Topaz.

item.name: Topaz Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Topaz
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Topaz.

item.name: Gold Topaz Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Gold Topaz.
